bioAsHtml: Sébastien Doeraene is a compiler/runtime systems hacker and a Scala enthusiast, now executive director of the Scala Center (https://scala.epfl.ch/). He holds a PhD from EPFL, having worked under the supervision of Prof. Martin Odersky, and a master's degree in computer science engineering from Université catholique de Louvain in Belgium. He is best known as the author of Scala.js (https://www.scala-js.org/). When he is not busy coding, he sings in choirs and a cappella groups such as the Ensemble Vocal Évohé, or rides around on a unicycle.

acceptedTalks.title: La Recette Magique de Scala.js : un Langage Transplateforme
